actions.committee: Committee on the Budget, and in addition to the Committee on Small Business, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on the Budget, and in addition to the Committee on Small Business, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: To improve the calculation of the subsidy rate with respect to certain small business loans and certain development company debentures.
short_title: Small Business Access to Credit Act of 2002

summary.text: Small Business Access to Credit Act of 2002 - Requires the Director of the Office of Management and Budget to use an approved econometric model to calculate the cost to the Small Business Administration for small business loans and loan guarantees and development company debentures authorized or issued under the Small Business Act.

titles.title: Small Business Access to Credit Act of 2002
To improve the calculation of the subsidy rate with respect to certain small business loans and certain development company debentures.
